tool_description: Pulls in the URL and Titles of Blogs of munaizahmed.com & among others.
title: Blog Articles

api_list.name: Get All Articles - nateliason.com
api_list.description: Fetches all articles' title and URL from nateliason.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blog-articles.p.rapidapi.com/nat"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blog-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Articles by Category - munaizahmed.com
api_list.description: You can fetch all articles from a category from munaizahmed.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://blog-articles.p.rapidapi.com/munaiz/{category}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "blog-articles.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
